Constant Field Values

Contents

  • constants.*

constants.*

  • constants.ConstantsSQL 
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    public static final java.lang.String DRIVER "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"
    public static final java.lang.String LOGIN "root"
    public static final java.lang.String PASSWORD "root"
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_QUERY_ADD_RECEIPT "INSERT INTO receipt (receipt_service_id, date_of_receipt_service, receipt_customer_id) VALUES (?,?,?)"
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_QUERY_ADD_RECEIPT_CUSTOMER "INSERT INTO receipt_customer (name, surname) VALUES (?,?)"
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_QUERY_DELETE_RECEIPT_BY_ID "delete from receipts_database.receipt where id = ?"
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_QUERY_GET_RECEIPT_CUSTOMERS "select * from receipt_customer"
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_QUERY_GET_RECEIPT_SERVICES "select * from receipt_service"
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_QUERY_GET_RECEIPTS "SELECT r.id, r.receipt_service_id, r.date_of_receipt_service , r.receipt_customer_id, rc.name AS receipt_customer_name, rc.surname AS receipt_customer_surname, rs.name AS receipt_service_name FROM receipt r INNER JOIN receipt_customer rc on r.receipt_customer_id=rc.id INNER JOIN receipt_service rs on r.receipt_service_id=rs.id "
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_QUERY_GET_RECEIPTS_IN_CURRENT_CUARTER "SELECT r.id, r.receipt_service_id, r.date_of_receipt_service , r.receipt_customer_id, rc.name AS receipt_customer_name, rc.surname AS receipt_customer_surname, rs.name AS receipt_service_name FROM receipt r INNER JOIN receipt_customer rc on r.receipt_customer_id=rc.id INNER JOIN receipt_service rs on r.receipt_service_id=rs.id where year(date_of_receipt_service) = year(now()) and quarter(date_of_receipt_service)= quarter(now())"
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_QUERY_GET_RECEIPTS_IN_CURRENT_DAY "SELECT r.id, r.receipt_service_id, r.date_of_receipt_service , r.receipt_customer_id, rc.name AS receipt_customer_name, rc.surname AS receipt_customer_surname, rs.name AS receipt_service_name FROM receipt r INNER JOIN receipt_customer rc on r.receipt_customer_id=rc.id INNER JOIN receipt_service rs on r.receipt_service_id=rs.id where date_of_receipt_service = curdate()"
    public static final java.lang.String SQL_QUERY_GET_RECEIPTS_IN_CURRENT_MONTH "SELECT r.id, r.receipt_service_id, r.date_of_receipt_service , r.receipt_customer_id, rc.name AS receipt_customer_name, rc.surname AS receipt_customer_surname, rs.name AS receipt_service_name FROM receipt r INNER JOIN receipt_customer rc on r.receipt_customer_id=rc.id INNER JOIN receipt_service rs on r.receipt_service_id=rs.id where date_of_receipt_service > LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)) AND date_of_receipt_service < DATE_ADD(LAST_DAY(CURDATE()), INTERVAL 1 DAY)"
    public static final java.lang.String URL_DATABASE "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/receipts_database?useSSL=false"
